Thanks Agentbay I found it and it is downloading right now. VLC plays ISO files and it can record anything it is playing. I'm not sure though IF the recording may not be as good as what you would have burning the ISO.
Odin1066---you can unpack an .iso file with 7zip or winrar to a VideoTS file and burn it with CloneDVD. That way if there is anything you don't need---you can remove it for fitting a smaller space.

*** I upload my torrents to The Pirate Bay and Demonoid, if you would like to upload one of my torrent files to another tracker feel free, all I ask is that you upload the same torrent file you downloaded by clicking on one of my links so that more seeders/peers are in the swarm.  ***
